body: oops, i will investigate this one and fix it soon.
hey @val-o do you have a CSB for this issue? so i can verify the fix. I can take a look at the previous version as well.

Oh i get it now. is it SSR?
that's why automation didn't pick it up.
Yes it appears to be on the server render, as in NextJS you can follow the stack trace down the the _document.js file (only used on SSR).
cool i will wrap the logic inside `useEffect`. patch is coming.
The issue is resolved in `5.4.1-beta.1` in my application.
cool publishing now. thanks a lot @asciant
